name: Are YOU Jelly?
tag_list: social-media, media, collection, collect, amazing-people, achieve, achievements, achievers
overview:
Claude and Jasmin Grecea, husband and wife, Co-founders of Are YOU Jelly? launch their new social website.

Have you done something or gone somewhere amazing? Do you own something remarkable? Are YOU Jelly? Be amazing. Get noticed. We encourage it! Entertain and inspire the envy that lives in all of us. Interact with your friends by flirting with jealousy and bragging about what makes you amazing. You can brag about your new car, that amazing trip to Europe, the first edition of your favorite comic book you just added to your collection, or that watch you finally got for your birthday.

milestones.description: A new social media website which encourages users to share significant life events and prize possessions with your friends, by “bragging about it” has now launched. Are YOU Jelly? is the brainchild of Co-founders Claude & Jasmin Grecea.
New social media website, Are YOU Jelly?, is asking the public to share their story about something amazing by participating in the 2013 winter Nikon Coolpix Digital Camera contest.
Are YOU Jelly? is running its second contest where you can win an Amazon Kindle Fire.
milestones.source_description: Launches Second Photo and Video Contest

milestones.description: Are YOU Jelly?, an innovative social media website that is determined to win the hearts and minds of collectors, achievers, and consumers who love to share their items and success stories, is pleased to announce today...
milestones.source_description: Are YOU Jelly? Enters into a Strategic Partnership with Luap Studios to Increase Brand Awareness
